goal.ch: 什麼樣的生活才是值得活的?存在的價值是什麼？在現實世界中名利雙收就能讓我們快樂嗎?幸福的必要條件是什麼？這是每一位追求幸福人生的人必然關心的問題。古今中外的哲學家都一致認定，倫理思考和美好生活之間具有密切的關係，因為倫理學本來關心的就是實際而具體的問題，倫理學家一向將道德理論應用於具體的情境，討論自殺、說謊、戰爭是否在某些狀況是道德上可允許的，討論人類對動物是否有道德義務、同性戀是否不道德等問題。這些倫理爭議在今天以不同的樣貌存在於各個社會，台灣亦不例外，許多與倫理道德糾纏不清的問題，極需倫理學介入面對與解決。本課程旨在對倫理學的基本原理及重要論題作初步的引介，並以現代社會所衍生的一系列社會事件為例，從各種實際問題出發，帶領同學進行思考，引領同學進行倫理思考與判斷，以期幫助學生理解倫理的三個實踐面向：（一）釐清爭議的倫理要件；（二）提供行為判斷的標準；（三）限制或激發個人的行為。因此，本課程將理論與應用並重，希望一方面能夠顧及基本理論的層面，另一方面結合日常生活中可能遭遇的議題，培養同學獨立思考的能力，並使能進一步釐清自己的價值觀與人生觀，進而能幫助同學找尋生命之價值和意義，而迎向和諧美好的生活。
goal.en: What kind of life is worth living? What is the value of existence? In the real world fame and fortune can make us happy? What are the necessary conditions for happiness? This is the pursuit of a happy life every person must be concerned about the problem. The philosophers of ancient and modern have agreed that there is a close relationship between ethical thinking and good life, because ethics is concerned with practical and concrete problems. Ethicsists have always applied moral theory to specific situations to discuss suicide, Lying, whether the war is morally permissible in certain situations, discussing whether human beings have moral obligations to animals, and whether homosexuality is unethical and so on. These ethical disputes exist in different societies today in different societies. Taiwan is no exception. Many of the problems that are entangled with ethics are highly ethical and confronted with and resolved. This course aims to make a preliminary introduction to the basic principles and important topics of ethics, and take a series of social events derived from modern society as examples, from various practical problems, lead students to think, lead students to ethical thinking and judgment , In order to help students understand the three practices of ethics: (a) to clarify the ethical elements of the dispute; (b) to provide the criteria for judging behavior; (c) to limit or stimulate individual behavior. Therefore, this course will be both theoretical and applied, hoping to take into account the basic theory of the one hand, on the other hand, combined with daily life may encounter problems, cultivate students the ability to think independently, and to further clarify their values ??and outlook on life , Which can help students find the value and meaning of life, and to meet the harmonious and beautiful life.
